name: Tonhalle ... Ausstellung von Arbeiten der in der Schweiz internierten deutschen Kriegsgefangenen LCCN2004665971 - from Commons

desc.html: English:  Title: Tonhalle ... Ausstellung von Arbeiten der in der Schweiz internierten deutschen Kriegsgefangenen Abstract: Poster shows a pensive German soldier resting his head on his fist. Text announces an exhibition of artwork by German prisoners of war held in Switzerland. Location, times, and entrance fee included. Physical description: 1 print (poster) : lithograph, color ; 124 x 90 cm. Notes: Forms part of: Rehse-Archiv für Zeitgeschichte und Publizistik.; Ludwig Hohlwein, München.; Title from item.
